responses.player: Greetings, Merchant! Have you any work for me today?
npc: Work? Well, I may have heard some rumors...
Are you familiar with the curious case of the wretched witch that has been plaguing the outer limits of our town?
The King has gotten so fed up with it, he's put a bounty on her head, and apparently, the one to claim it will earn the King's favor

dialogOptions.player: A witch, eh? I think I can do something about it... Thank you for the tip!
npc: Oh, but of course! I always seek to help a fellow in need. Just rememember who told you when you finally get that witch!

dialogOptions.player: Hmm, a witch doesn't sound too appealing to me right now. Perhaps another time.
npc: Very well, though do hurry, someone else may claim the prize before you do.
